mapper.select:
SELECT ln.id, su.id as 'user_id', lp.laf_photoUrl, ln.type
FROM `laf_notice` ln LEFT JOIN laf_photos lp ON ln.id = lp.laf_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON ln.`create_id` = su.id WHERE ln.done = 1 AND ln.`status` = 0 AND ln.type = 0 AND lp.index_display = 0 ORDER BY rand() LIMIT 4;

SELECT ln.id, su.id as 'user_id', lp.laf_photoUrl, ln.type FROM `laf_notice` ln LEFT JOIN laf_photos lp ON ln.id = lp.laf_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON ln.`create_id` = su.id WHERE ln.done = 1 AND ln.`status` = 0 AND ln.type = 1 AND lp.index_display = 0 ORDER BY rand() LIMIT 4;

SELECT ln.id, su.id as 'user_id', lp.laf_photoUrl, ln.type, su.user_name FROM `laf_notice` ln LEFT JOIN laf_photos lp ON ln.id = lp.laf_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON ln.`create_id` = su.id WHERE ln.done = 1 AND ln.`status` = 0 AND ln.type = 0 AND urgency = 0 AND lp.index_display = 0 ORDER BY rand() LIMIT 4;

SELECT ln.id, su.id as 'user_id', lp.laf_photoUrl, ln.type, sa.avatar_url, su.user_name, ln.message, ln.view, ln.done FROM laf_notice ln LEFT JOIN laf_photos lp ON lp.laf_id = ln.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = ln.`create_id` LEFT JOIN sys_avatar sa ON sa.user_id = ln.`create_id` AND sa.`status` = 0 WHERE ln.message LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyWords}, '%') AND lp.index_display = 0

SELECT ln.id, su.id AS 'user_id', lp.laf_photoUrl, ln.type, sa.avatar_url, su.user_name, ln.message, ln.done FROM laf_notice ln LEFT JOIN laf_photos lp ON lp.laf_id = ln.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = ln.`create_id` LEFT JOIN sys_avatar sa ON sa.user_id = ln.`create_id` AND sa.`status` = 0
WHERE ln.type = 0 AND lp.index_display = 0

SELECT ln.id, su.id AS 'user_id', lp.laf_photoUrl, ln.type, sa.avatar_url, su.user_name, ln.message, ln.view, ln.done FROM laf_notice ln LEFT JOIN laf_photos lp ON lp.laf_id = ln.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = ln.`create_id` LEFT JOIN sys_avatar sa ON sa.user_id = ln.`create_id` AND sa.`status` = 0 WHERE ln.id = #{noticeId} LIMIT 1;

SELECT ln.id, su.id AS 'user_id', lp.laf_photoUrl, ln.type, sa.avatar_url, su.user_name, ln.message, ln.view, ln.done FROM laf_notice ln LEFT JOIN laf_photos lp ON lp.laf_id = ln.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = ln.`create_id` LEFT JOIN sys_avatar sa ON sa.user_id = ln.`create_id` AND sa.`status` = 0 WHERE ln.helper_userId = #{userId} And ln.done = 0;

SELECT ln.id, su.id AS 'user_id', lp.laf_photoUrl, ln.type, sa.avatar_url, su.user_name, ln.message, ln.view, ln.done FROM laf_notice ln LEFT JOIN laf_photos lp ON lp.laf_id = ln.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = ln.`create_id` LEFT JOIN sys_avatar sa ON sa.user_id = ln.`create_id` AND sa.`status` = 0
SELECT lp.laf_photoUrl FROM laf_notice ln LEFT JOIN laf_photos lp ON lp.laf_id = ln.id WHERE ln.id = #{noticeId} LIMIT 4;

SELECT ln.id, su.id AS 'user_id', lp.laf_photoUrl, ln.type, sa.avatar_url, su.user_name, ln.message, ln.view, ln.done FROM laf_notice ln LEFT JOIN laf_photos lp ON lp.laf_id = ln.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = ln.`create_id` LEFT JOIN sys_avatar sa ON sa.user_id = ln.`create_id` AND sa.`status` = 0
WHERE ln.type = 1 AND lp.index_display = 0
